Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

About Me

I am a web developer specialising in front-end development and UX/UI design. I love the process of creating innovative and performant applications that add value to peopleâ€™s lives. This passion has propelled me to learn a vast range of technologies with the aim of creating solutions to difficult problems.

My projects focus on the client side, which mainly comprise of front-end technologies such as React. However, I am currently spending my evenings learning back-end technologies such as Node.JS, Express and MongoDB. My long term goal is to become an effective full stack developer, able to efficiently turn great ideas into working products.
